title: Chicken liver pâté with madeira jelly
description: Smooth, creamy pâté is topped with quails’ eggs and a Maderia jelly for the ultimate in indulgence. Serve with toasted sourdough.
ingredients: 450g/1lb chicken livers (soaked overnight in milk to remove any bitterness)
2 tbsp redcurrant jelly, melted in a pan over a low heat
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 gelatine leaves, softened in cold water for 10 minutes
